title: FedEx Delivery
text: Package requires customs fee payment. Pay at delivery location.
shortSummary: Delivery scam charging fake customs fee.

title: USCISS Alert
text: URGENT: I-20 issue. Submit passport info here: http://uscis-fix-docs.com

title: Bank of America
text: Unusual login attempt detected. Verify your account immediately.

title: Mom
text: Honey can you send me your phone number again? My contacts reset.
shortSummary: Real parent asking for phone number again.

title: Uber
text: Your driver is arriving now. Please wait nearby.

title: Amazon
text: Your account is locked for security. Restore access at amazon-check.biz

title: Recruiter
text: You've been shortlisted for a $7,000/month remote job. Reply YES to continue.

title: Campus Safety
text: Police activity near campus. Stay indoors until further notice.

title: Unknown
text: Hi‚Ä¶ my phone broke and I lost your number. Is this still you?

title: Apple ID
text: Your Apple ID was used on a new device. If this wasn't you, secure your account.
shortSummary: Could be a real or scam security alert.

title: IRS
text: You owe immediate tax payments. Failure to respond will result in penalties.

title: Gift Center
text: You've won an iPad! Claim your reward now.

title: Landlord
text: Rent reminder for this month. Please confirm after payment.

title: Cloud Storage
text: Your storage is almost full. Upgrade to avoid losing photos.

title: Emergency Contact
text: Your friend was in an accident. Reply immediately! DO NOT call.

title: System Notification
text: Your phone is infected. Tap here to remove viruses.

title: Chase
text: Your scheduled payment of $1,245 was processed.

title: Receipt
text: Your purchase is confirmed. View receipt here: bit.ly/receipt44

title: Clinic
text: Your lab results are ready. Log into your health portal to view.

title: Cash App
text: You received $750 from Alex. Claim before it expires.

title: Wells Fargo
text: Your account has been temporarily locked. Restore at wells-login-help.com

title: School Admin
text: Campus shuttle will stop service at 7pm today.

title: UPS
text: We couldn't deliver your parcel. Update your address now.

title: Health Center
text: Reminder: Your appointment is tomorrow at 11 AM.

title: Airline Alert
text: Your flight has a schedule update. Check the latest details.

title: Loan Offer
text: Get approved for a $20,000 loan instantly. No credit check.

title: Package Center
text: Your package is waiting. Pay 12 RMB service fee to receive it.

title: Interview Team
text: Your interview is confirmed for tomorrow at 2 PM.

title: Carrier Notice
text: Your phone plan is expiring. Renew to avoid service interruption.

title: Lucky Spin
text: You have 1 free spin left! Claim your prize now!
